text: warrthna bani 'iisrayiyl aldhyn kanuu yustadhallun llkhdmt, mashariq al'ard wamagharibaha (why bilad "alsham") alati barakna fyha, bi'iikhraj alzrwe walthmar walanhar, watamat kalimat rabik -ayha alrswl- alhsna ealaa bani 'iisrayiyl baltmkyn lahum fi alard; bsbb sbrhm ealaa 'adhana fireawn wqwmh, wdmmarna ma kan yasnae fireawn waqawmuh min alemarat walmzare, wama kanuu yabnun min al'abniat walqswr waghayr dhlk
